mapper.insert: insert into book_review(rno, bno, review, reviewer) values(seq_book_review.nextval, #{bno}, #{review}, #{reviewer})
mapper.update: update book_review set review = #{review}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select bno, rno, review, reviewer, reviewDate, updatedate from (select /*+INDEX(book_review idx_book_review) */ rownum rn, bno, rno, review, reviewer, reviewDate, updatedate from book_review where bno = #{bno} and rno > 0 and rownum <=#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from book_review where bno = #{bno}
